title: Pixel 4a w/ Android 11, how do I silence battery full notification?
content:
How do I silence the "Battery Full" notification on my Pixel 4a w/ Android 11?  I don't know who decided that having my phone awaken me at 3am because it fully charged is a good idea, but it's not.  I went to "Recent Notifications", and none is listed.  I found instructions for earlier versions that entailed using the three-dot menu under "notifications", and that does not exist on this phone.

Note:  That this is even needed is yet another reason that removing the notification LED was a really bad idea.
